content: Investments ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 May 2019At the moment when markets are not doing well, what ETFs are the best to purchase?Hi all. I'm thinking about investing more in ETFs but want to know what everybody thinks first. The markets aren't doing too well and i'm wondering which ETF would work and reap the best returns?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 May 2019Inverse ETFs, if you can stomach the risk and can actively monitor the positions. This class of ETFs increase in price when the corresponding "normal" ETF fall0 comments1
